events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your resume and skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out to you soon regarding the next steps.
We completed the initial screening and are impressed with your background; expect a technical interview invite.
You responded promptly confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview; thank you.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
The technical interview was completed successfully, and the interviewers were impressed by your skills.
We have scheduled an HR interview for you on May 25th to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview was positive and the team is excited about the potential of you joining us.
We have sent you a formal offer for the software engineer role, including compensation and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you to our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has started; we have scheduled your orientation and setup for your first day.
The hiring process is now closed, and your employment with us as a software engineer is officially confirmed.
